changelogversion.changelogtext: Restricted about page header height in landscape mode.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added text about default copyright of images.
Changed the height of the image section on the node details view to be more prominent.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed sizing of related items on the node details view.

changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added data source update check to notify when an update is available.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed an issue with the main grid on older Android versions (pre-Lollipop).

changelogversion.changelogtext: Simplified attribute view by removing expand/collapse buttons.
Made color palette detection code more robust, so that it finds a color for the image in almost all cases.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed annoying orientation change bug where the node images weren't sized correctly.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added "similar diseases" section to disease details page.
Added main grid layout options to preferences screen.

changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed a bug with concurrent data source downloads by only allowing one download at a time for now.
Fixed an issue where a downloaded data source that is no longer available on the server wasn't selectable anymore.
Fixed the floating action button (FAB) not reappearing after scrolling on the node view.

changelogversion.changelogtext: Search now closes with a single click on the "x" symbol.

changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added round launcher icon for Android 7.1 devices.
Added image details view where you can zoom/pan images. Open it by clicking on any of the images on the node details page.
Made the data source selection page work offline so that you can switch between data sources that are already downloaded even without a network connection.

changelogversion.changelogtext: Changed search so that it removes leading and trailing spaces from search terms.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed issue with layout update when the search is cancelled.

changelogversion.changelogtext: Initial release of Buntata to closed alpha.
